[b] Really great fun with or without friends. [/b]
The balance between survivors and killer feels really good. [i] - Can't escape super easy but killer also can't win super easy. [/i] 
You get the odd toxic sweat who camp hooks and things like that but I think for the most part it 's a friendly player base so not a lot play like that. 
[b] Never really had an issue finding a game. [/b] Sometimes it takes a minute or 2 if you play at a really strange time but otherwise no issues. Seems to always be other people playing so that's a [b] big plus. [/b]

fun game to play with friends

The gameplay can be alright (despite the community) but man, I've never seen a game with such terrible support for resolution settings. 

I use an ultrawide 21:9 monitor, but the devs don't support those because they consider the extra FOV to be unfair. If I start the game on my 21:9 monitor, about 30% of the screen gets cut off on the top and bottom. Fine, whatever, I'm ok with playing at normal 16:9 then. But whoops, there's no setting for aspect ratio. Ok, I try windowed - still locked to 21:9, can't adjust the size. Well that sucks. I try going into the config files. Changing the resolution does nothing. I find some weird fix that makes the game run in "true fullscreen"? (Apparently the devs bodged the fullscreen of this game, such that it's actually a borderless window the whole time). Ok, now the game is 16:9 (stretched, because of course it is) but my screen flickers black for about 5 seconds once every minute. So that's unplayable. How about playing it on my second monitor? Nope, no setting to do that, I'd have to change my Windows setting on my default monitor every time I play the game, and change it back every time after.

I've been an ultrawide user since 2015, back when well under 1% of monitors were this aspect ratio. so I understand that some games won't play nice. But these devs are either the most incompetent I've ever seen in terms of handling resolution, or an ultrawide user ran over one of their dogs or something. 

This game isn't worth it. The community reminds me of playing tag with the lame kids in elementary school ("Stop targeting me!!!", "You're camping that thing!!!"). Graphics and performance are mediocre, independent of the resolution issues. Game got commercialized to hell in between me playing it at release vs. trying it again now, and the DLC cosmetics are reminding me of the worst of the Call of Duty skins now.

Play something else.
